solution_line_template: First convert the quarantine wait time to hours by multiplying the number of days by the number of hours in a day: {quarantine_days} days * {hours_per_day} hours/day = <<{quarantine_days}*{hours_per_day}={quarantine_hours}>>{quarantine_hours} hours

Then add the time Jack spent waiting in customs to the quarantine time: {quarantine_hours} hours + {customs_wait_hours} hours = <<{quarantine_hours}+{customs_wait_hours}={total_wait_hours}>>{total_wait_hours} hours
